title: Brett Rhodes, Bridget Heffelfinger, and Raymond Brady Communcations and Other Documents

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

1. Training manual for Assistant County Administrators regarding estates trust and probate investigations..

2. All email and text communications between Raymond Brady and Brett Rhodes between December 1st, 2023 to May 2nd 2023.

3. All email and text communications between Bridget Heffelfinger and Brett Rhodes between December 1st, 2023 to May 2nd 2023.

4. All email and text communications between James Malcolm and Brett Rhodes between December 1st, 2023 to May 2nd 2023.

5. An organizational chart of the County Administrators Office. 

6. Probate investigation protocols, training manuals for probate investigations, contained by the County Administrators Office.

7.All email and text communications between RBRA CEO Brad Gross and Brett Rhodes between December 1st, 2023 to May 2nd 2023.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Robbie Powelson
